<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/prompts/{prompt_id}"}

>

Get prompt.

Get a prompt by its identifier and optional version.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
